city.description: City the charging point is in.

postal_code.description: Postal code the charging point is at.

street.description: Street address the chargin point is at.

provider.description: The provider name of the charging point.

displayed_state_of_charge.description: Displayed state of charge to the driver

displayed_start_state_of_charge.description: Displayed state of charge at start to the driver

time_zone.description: Time zone of the charging session

start_time.description: Start time of the charging session

end_time.description: End time of the charging session

total_charging_duration.description: Total time charging was active during the session

calculated_energy_charged.description: Calculated amount of energy charged during the session

odometer.description: The vehicle odometer value in a given units

city.description: City the charging point is in.

postal_code.description: Postal code the charging point is at.

street.description: Street address the chargin point is at.

provider.description: The provider name of the charging point.

data_slots_free.description: Remaining number of POI data slots available.

data_slots_max.description: Maximum number of POI data slots.

arrival_duration.description: Remaining time until reaching the destination.

distance_to_destination.description: Remaining distance to reach the destination.

battery_consumption_to_destination.description: Required battery charge level to proceed to the next destination.

charging_time_for_destination.description: Required charging time to reach the next destination.

wheel_suspension.description: The wheel suspension level percentage, whereas 0.0 is no suspension and 1.0 maximum suspension

lock_safety.description: Indicates the safe-state of the trunk.

inside_locks.description: Inside lock states for the given doors

locks.description: Lock states for the given doors

positions.description: Door positions for the given doors

inside_locks_state.description: Inside locks state for the whole vehicle (combines all specific lock states if available)

locks_state.description: Locks state for the whole vehicle (combines all specific lock states if available)

switch_position.description: Position of the rotary light switch

parking_light_status.description: Indicates the status of the parking light.

current_spring_rates.description: The current values for the spring rates

maximum_spring_rates.description: The maximum possible values for the spring rates

minimum_spring_rates.description: The minimum possible values for the spring rates

current_chassis_position.description: The chassis position calculated from the lowest point

maximum_chassis_position.description: The maximum possible value for the chassis position

minimum_chassis_position.description: The minimum possible value for the chassis position

lock.description: Includes the lock state of the hood.

lock_safety.description: Indicates the safe-state of the hood.

battery_current.description: Battery current - charging if posititive and discharning when negative.

max_range.description: Maximum electric range with 100% of battery

battery_level_at_departure.description: Battery charge level expected at time of departure

preconditioning_departure_status.description: Status of preconditioning at departure time

preconditioning_error.description: Preconditioning error if one is encountered

charging_complete_lock.description: Locking status of the charging plug after charging complete.

battery_max_available.description: Maximum available energy content of the high-voltage battery.

charging_end_reason.description: Reason for ending a charging process.

charging_phases.description: Charging process count of the high-voltage battery (phases).

battery_energy.description: Energy content of the high-voltage battery.

battery_energy_chargable.description: Energy required until high-voltage battery is fully charged.

charging_time_display.description: Charging time displayed in the vehicle.

departure_time_display.description: Departure time displayed in the vehicle.

limit_status.description: Indicates whether charging limit is active.

smart_charging_option.description: Smart charging option being used to charge with.

estimated_range_target.description: Remaining electric range depending on target charging status.

fully_charged_end_times.description: Time and weekday when the vehicle will be fully charged.

battery_voltage.description: High-voltage battery electric potential difference (aka voltage).

battery_tempretature_extremes.description: Current highest-lowest temperature inside the battery.

battery_temperature_control_demand.description: Current demand of HV battery temperature control system.

battery_led.description: State of LED for the battery.

battery_temperature_extremes.description: Current highest-lowest temperature inside the battery.

driving_mode_phev.description: Indicates the current driving mode for Plug-In Hybrid Vehicle.

battery_charge_transfer_event.description: Indicates that the high-voltage battery lost state of charge due to an energy transfer to the 12V battery.

station_power_type.description: The power type of the connected charging station.

station_displayed_status.description: Status shown on the display of the charging station.

battery_performance_status.description: Performance status of the xEV battery.

hybrid_operating_mode.description: Operating mode of the hybrid vehicle.

conserving_charge.description: Indicates if the vehicle is conserving charge.

charging_rate_distance.description: Range increase per time unit during ongoing charging process based on the average energy comsumption for driving.

time.description: Duration of time for the given distance
Duration of time for the given distance

severity.description: Severity of the crash (from 0 to 7 - very high severity)

status.description: The system effect an inpact had on the vehicle.

currency.description: The currency alphabetic code per ISO 4217 or crypto currency symbol

charging_power.description: Charging power output from the charger

currency.description: The currency alphabetic code per ISO 4217 or crypto currency symbol

distance_since_start.description: The distance driven since trip start

fuel_volume.description: The fuel volume measured in liters

engine_total_operating_hours.description: The accumulated time of engine operation

wheel_based_speed.description: The vehicle speed measured at the wheel base

battery_level.description: Battery level in %, value between 0.0 and 1.0

rpm.description: The RPM measured at this wheel

odometer.description: The vehicle odometer value in a given units

engine_total_operating_time.description: The accumulated time of engine operation

brake_lining_wear_pre_warning.description: Status of brake lining wear pre-warning

engine_oil_life_remaining.description: Remaining life of engine oil which decreases over time

data.description: OEM trouble code key-pair with identifier

key_value.description: Key-value pair for the trouble code

diesel_exhaust_fluid_range.description: Distance remaining until diesel exhaust fluid is empty

diesel_particulate_filter_soot_level.description: Level of soot in diesel exhaust particulate filter

engine_total_idle_operating_time.description: The accumulated time of engine operation

engine_oil_amount.description: The current estimated oil tank liquid fill.

engine_oil_level.description: The current estimated oil tank liquid fill in percentage.

fuel_level_accuracy.description: This value includes the information, if the fuel level has been calculated or measured.

tire_pressures_targets.description: Target tire pressures for the vehicle.

tire_pressures_differences.description: Tire pressures difference from the target pressure.

backup_battery_remaining_time.description: Remaining time the backup battery can work.

engine_time_to_next_service.description: Engine time until next service of the vehicle

low_voltage_battery_charge_level.description: Indicates if the charge level of the low voltage battery is too low to use other systems

passenger_airbag_status.description: Passenger airbag is activated or not

estimated_mixed_powertrain_range.description: Estimated distance the vehicle can travel with the current fuel level

data.description: OEM trouble code key-pair with identifier

key_value.description: Key-value pair for the trouble code

rpm.description: The RPM measured at this wheel

average_weekly_distance_long_run.description: Average weekyl distance over long term

period.description: Percentage of the period used for a driving mode

consumption.description: Energy consumption in the driving mode

last_trip_energy_consumption.description: Energy consumption in the last trip

last_trip_fuel_consumption.description: Fuel consumption in the last trip

last_trip_electric_portion.description: Portion of the last trip used in electric mode

last_trip_average_energy_recuperation.description: Energy recuperation rate for last trip

average_fuel_consumption.description: Average fuel consumption for current trip

rapid_acceleration_grade.description: Grade given for rapid acceleration over time

rapid_deceleration_grade.description: Grade given for rapid deceleration over time

late_night_grade.description: Grade given for late night driving over time

distance_over_time.description: Distance driven over a given time period

time.description: Duration of time for the given distance

electric_consumption_rate_since_start.description: Electric energy consumption rate since the start of a trip

electric_consumption_rate_since_reset.description: Electric energy consumption rate since a reset

electric_distance_last_trip.description: Distance travelled with electricity in last trip

electric_distance_since_reset.description: Distance travelled with electricity since reset

electric_duration_last_trip.description: Duration of travelling using electricity during last trip

electric_duration_since_reset.description: Duration of travelling using electricity since reset

fuel_consumption_rate_last_trip.description: Liquid fuel consumption rate during last trip

fuel_consumption_rate_since_reset.description: Liquid fuel consumption rate since reset

fuel_distance_last_trip.description: Distance travelled with (liquid) fuel during last trip

fuel_distance_since_reset.description: Distance travelled with (liquid) fuel since reset

trip_meters.description: Independent meter that can be reset at any time by the driver

data.description: Independent meter that can be reset at any time by the driver

electric_consumption_average.description: Average electric energy consumption calculated based on the last 20km

acceleration_durations.description: Durations of normal or other accelerations.

last_trip_battery_regenerated.description: Estimated electrical charge (in %) that was recovered through regeneration during a trip.

time.description: Duration of time for the given distance

period.description: Percentage of the period used for a driving mode

consumption.description: Energy consumption in the driving mode

data.description: Independent meter that can be reset at any time by the driver

altitude.description: Altitude above the WGS 84 reference ellipsoid

fuzzy_coordinates.description: Fuzzy coordinates for the vehicle location.

understeering.description: The understeering percentage between 0.0-1.0 whereas up to 0.2 (20%) is considered OK, up to 0.3 (30%) marginal, over 30% critical

oversteering.description: The oversteering percentage between 0.0-1.0 whereas up to 0.2 (20%) is considered OK, up to 30% marginal, over 30% critical

gas_pedal_position.description: The gas pedal position between 0.0-1.0, whereas 1.0 (100%) is full throttle

steering_angle.description: The steering angle, whereas 0.0 is straight ahead, positive number to the right and negative number to the left

selected_gear.description: The selected gear value, if any

brake_pedal_position.description: The brake pedal position between 0.0-1.0, wheras 1.0 (100%) is full brakes

drivetrain_state.description: State of the drivetrain for starts.

accelerator_durations.description: Duration during which the accelerator pedal has been pressed more than the given percentage.

pedal_position_threshold.description: The accelerator pedal position threshold percentage

duration.description: The duration of the accelerator pedal position

pedal_position_threshold.description: The accelerator pedal position threshold percentage

duration.description: The duration of the accelerator pedal position

last_event_level.description: Level of impact for the last event

event_type.description: Position of the last even relative to the vehicle

interior_protection_triggered.description: Indicates whether the interior protection sensors are triggered.

tow_protection_triggered.description: Indicates whether the tow protection sensors are triggered.

status.description: Indicates whether the driver assistance system is active or not.

alertness_system_status.description: Indicates if the driver alertness warning is active or inactive.

forward_collision_warning_system.description: Indicates whether the forward collision warning system is active or inactive.

blind_spot_warning_state.description: Indicates whether the blind spot warning system is active or not.

rear_cross_warning_system.description: Indicates whether the rear cross warning system is active or not.

lane_keep_assist_system.description: Indicates if the lane keep assist system is turned on or not.

lane_keep_assists_states.description: Lane keeping assist state indicating the vehicle is actively controlling the wheels.

park_assists.description: If the alarm is active and the driver has muted or not park assists.

blind_spot_warning_system.description: Indicates whether the blind spot warning system is turned on or not.

days_to_next_service.description: Time until next servicing of the car

kilometers_to_next_service.description: The distance until next servicing of the vehicle

time_to_next_service.description: Time until next servicing of the vehicle

distance_to_next_service.description: The distance until next servicing of the vehicle

distance_to_next_oil_service.description: Indicates the remaining distance until the next oil service; if this limit was exceeded, this value indicates the distance that has been driven since then.

time_to_next_oil_service.description: Indicates the time remaining until the next oil service; if this limit was exceeded, this value indicates the time that has passed since then.

brake_fluid_remaining_distance.description: Indicates the remaining distance for brake fluid.

service_status.description: Consolidated status regarding service requirements. OK: no current service requirement, WARNING: at least one service has reported requirement, CRITICAL: at least one service is overdue.

service_date.description: Date of the earliest service. If this service is overdue, the date is in the past.

drive_in_inspection_distance_to.description: The distance until next drive-in inspection of the vehicle

vehicle_check_date.description: Vehicle check date (usually after a predetermined distance).

vehicle_check_distance_to.description: The distance until next vehicle check.

sunroof_rain_event.description: Sunroof event happened in case of rain

windscreen_zone_matrix.description: Representing the size of the matrix, seen from the inside of the vehicle

windscreen_damage_zone.description: Representing the position in the zone, seen from the inside of the vehicle (1-based index)

windscreen_damage_confidence.description: Confidence of damage detection, 0% if no impact detected

acc_target_speed.description: The target speed of the Adaptive Cruise Control

driver_name.description: Name of the driver of the trip

start_odometer.description: Odometer reading at the start of the trip

end_odometer.description: Odometer reading at the end of the trip

average_fuel_consumption.description: Average fuel consumption during the trip

data.description: A single component of the full address
A single component of the full address

total_fuel_consumption.description: Total fuel consumption during the trip

total_idle_fuel_consumption.description: Fuel consumed while idle since the last ignition on.

maximum_speed.description: Maximum speed recorded since the last igntion on.

braking_count.description: Number of times the brakes were applied during the trip.

data.description: A single component of the full address

start_stop_state.description: Indicates wheter the start-stop system is currently active or not

start_stop_enabled.description: Indicates if the automatic start-stop system is enabled or not

preconditioning_enabled.description: Use of the engine pre-conditioning is enabled.

preconditioning_error.description: Reason for not carrying out pre-conditioning.

limp_mode.description: Indicates wheter the engine is in fail-safe mode.

rain_intensity.description: Measured raining intensity percentage, whereas 0% is no rain and 100% is maximum rain
